file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
servers:
  - url: https://app.orbit.love/api/v1
info:
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: Orbit
    iconPath: "icon.png"
  description: >-
    This is a generated connector for [Orbit API v1](https://docs.orbit.love/reference/about-the-orbit-api) OpenAPI specification. 

    Orbit API used to track activities of users and manage users.
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials.

    Create an [Orbit Account](https://app.orbit.love/signup) and obtain tokens by following [this guide](https://docs.orbit.love/reference/authorization).
  title: Orbit API
  version: v1
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - customer_relation
  x-logo:
    url: https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/55637052?s=200&v=4
  x-origin:
    - format: openapi
      url: https://app.orbit.love/api-docs/v1/swagger.json
      version: "3.0"
  x-providerName: orbit.love
tags:
  - name: Activity Types
  - name: Activities
  - name: Members
  - name: Notes
  - name: Reports
  - name: Users
  - name: Workspaces
paths:
  /activity_types:
    get:
      operationId: getActivityTypes
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  - attributes:
                      category: content
                      key: post:created
                      name: Created content
                      short_name: Content created
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "7"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: discord
                      key: discord:message:sent
                      name: Sent a message in Discord
                      short_name: Discord message
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "16"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: discord
                      key: discord:message:replied
                      name: Replied to a message in Discord
                      short_name: Discord message reply
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "17"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: discord
                      key: discord:server:joined
                      name: Joined a server in Discord
                      short_name: Discord server join
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "18"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: discourse
                      key: discourse:post:created
                      name: Created a Discourse post
                      short_name: Discourse post
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "11"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: discourse
                      key: discourse:topic:created
                      name: Created a Discourse topic
                      short_name: Discourse topic
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "12"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: github
                      key: star:created
                      name: Starred a repository
                      short_name: GitHub star
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "4"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: github
                      key: issue_comment:created
                      name: Commented on an issue
                      short_name: Issue comment
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "5"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: github
                      key: issues:opened
                      name: Opened an issue
                      short_name: Issue opened
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "1"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: github
                      key: pull_requests:merged
                      name: Had a pull request merged
                      short_name: Merged pull request
                      weight: "2.0"
                    id: "3"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: github
                      key: pull_requests:opened
                      name: Opened a pull request
                      short_name: Opened pull request
                      weight: "2.0"
                    id: "2"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: slack
                      key: slack:channel:joined
                      name: Joined a channel in Slack
                      short_name: Slack channel join
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "14"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: slack
                      key: slack:message:sent
                      name: Sent a message in Slack
                      short_name: Slack message
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "13"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: slack
                      key: slack:thread:replied
                      name: Replied to a thread in Slack
                      short_name: Slack thread reply
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "15"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: twitter
                      key: twitter:followed
                      name: Followed on twitter
                      short_name: Twitter follow
                      weight: "0.5"
                    id: "10"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      category: twitter
                      key: tweet:sent
                      name: Tweeted
                      short_name: Twitter mention
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "9"
                    type: activity_type
          description: success
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get all activity types
      tags:
        - Activity Types
  /user:
    get:
      operationId: getCurrentUser
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  attributes:
                    created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.179Z
                    email: orville_windler@jones.name
                    name: StanDibbertMD
                    updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.179Z
                  id: "11"
                  type: user
          description: success
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get info about the current user
      tags:
        - Users
  /workspaces:
    get:
      operationId: getWorkspaces
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  - attributes:
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.786Z
                      name: Fake Workspace
                      slug: fake-workspace
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.794Z
                    id: "101"
                    relationships: {}
                    type: workspace
          description: success
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get all workspaces for the current user
      tags:
        - Workspaces
  "/workspaces/{workspace_id}":
    get:
      operationId: getWorkspaceById
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: workspace_id
          description: "Workspace ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  attributes:
                    activities_count: 1
                    created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.825Z
                    members_count: 1
                    name: Fake Workspace
                    slug: fake-workspace
                    tags: {}
                    updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.876Z
                  id: "102"
                  relationships:
                    last_activity:
                      data:
                        id: "36"
                        type: activity
                    last_member:
                      data:
                        id: "53"
                        type: member
                  type: workspace
                included:
                  - attributes:
                      activities_count: 1
                      avatar_url: http://github.com/avatar.png
                      bio: null
                      birthday: null
                      company: null
                      created: false
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.863Z
                      deleted_at: null
                      devto: null
                      discord: null
                      discourse: null
                      email: null
                      first_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.856Z
                      github: null
                      github_followers: null
                      id: 53
                      languages: null
                      last_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.856Z
                      linkedin: null
                      location: null
                      love: 1
                      merged_at: null
                      name: FernandaSchowalterJr
                      orbit_level: 3
                      orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/fake-workspace/members/fernandaschowalterjr
                      pronouns: null
                      reach: 0
                      shipping_address: null
                      slug: fernandaschowalterjr
                      source: installation
                      tag_list: []
                      tags: []
                      teammate: false
                      title: null
                      topics: null
                      tshirt: null
                      twitter: null
                      twitter_followers: null
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.874Z
                      url: null
                    id: "53"
                    relationships:
                      identities:
                        data: []
                    type: member
                  - attributes:
                      action: opened
                      activity_link: https://github.com/
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.864Z
                      key: sukmurazik/rodrigomoriette#63
                      occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.856Z
                      orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/fake-workspace/activities/36
                      tags:
                        - channel:github
                        - github_organization:sukmurazik
                        - github_repository:sukmurazik/rodrigomoriette
                        - github_pull_request:sukmurazik/rodrigomoriette/#63
                      type: PullRequestActivity
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:26.864Z
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "36"
                    relationships:
                      activity_type:
                        data:
                          id: "48"
                          type: activity_type
                      member:
                        data:
                          id: "53"
                          type: member
                      repository:
                        data:
                          id: "7"
                          type: repository
                    type: activity
          description: success
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get a workspace
      tags:
        - Workspaces
  "/{workspace_id}/activities":
    get:
      operationId: getActivitiesInWorkspace
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: workspace_id
          description: "Workspace ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: activity_tags
          description: "Activity tags allow to group activities"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: affiliation
          description: "Association with either 'member' or 'teammate'"
          schema:
            enum:
              - member
              - teammate
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: member_tags
          description: "Member tags allow to group members"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: orbit_level
          description: "Orbit level"
          schema:
            enum:
              - "1"
              - "2"
              - "3"
              - "4"
              - n
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: activity_type
          description: "Activity type related to activities"
          schema:
            enum:
              - issues:opened
              - issue_comment:created
              - pull_requests:opened
              - pull_requests:merged
              - star:created
              - discord:message:sent
              - tweet:sent
              - discord:message:replied
              - custom:happened
              - discord:server:joined
              - twitter:followed
              - slack:channel:joined
              - slack:thread:replied
              - discourse:topic:created
              - discourse:post:created
              - slack:message:sent
              - note:created
              - post:created
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: weight
          description: "Weighted score of activity"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: identity
          description: "Activity identity of platforms"
          schema:
            enum:
              - github
              - twitter
              - email
              - discourse
              - linkedin
              - devto
              - slack
              - discord
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: location
          description: "Identifier for the location"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: company
          description: "Identifier for the company"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: start_date
          description: "Activity start date"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: end_date
          description: "Activity end date"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: page
          description: "Page of the activities"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: direction
          description: "Sort activities 'ASC' if Ascending and 'DESC' if Descending"
          schema:
            enum:
              - ASC
              - DESC
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: items
          description: "Number of activities"
          schema:
            enum:
              - "10"
              - "50"
              - "100"
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: sort
          description: "Sort activities by properties of activity"
          schema:
            enum:
              - occurred_at
              - member
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: type
          description: "Type related to activities"
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  - attributes:
                      action: spec_action
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.808Z
                      key: spec_activity_key#2
                      occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.806Z
                      orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/jaredlang/activities/7
                      tags:
                        - spec-tag-1
                        - spec-tag-2
                      type: SpecActivity
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.808Z
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "7"
                    relationships:
                      activity_type:
                        data:
                          id: "26"
                          type: activity_type
                      member:
                        data:
                          id: "4"
                          type: member
                    type: spec_activity
                included:
                  - attributes:
                      category: spec_category
                      key: spec:activity
                      name: Did spec activity
                      short_name: Spec Activity
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "26"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      activities_count: 2
                      avatar_url: http://github.com/avatar.png
                      bio: null
                      birthday: null
                      company: null
                      created: false
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.789Z
                      deleted_at: null
                      devto: null
                      discord: null
                      discourse: null
                      email: null
                      first_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.806Z
                      github: null
                      github_followers: null
                      id: 4
                      languages: null
                      last_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.836Z
                      linkedin: null
                      location: null
                      love: 1.2
                      merged_at: null
                      name: VeronikaLeannon
                      orbit_level: 2
                      orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/jaredlang/members/veronikaleannon
                      pronouns: null
                      reach: 0
                      shipping_address: null
                      slug: veronikaleannon
                      source: installation
                      tag_list:
                        - ruby
                      tags:
                        - ruby
                      teammate: false
                      title: null
                      topics: null
                      tshirt: null
                      twitter: null
                      twitter_followers: null
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.849Z
                      url: null
                    id: "4"
                    relationships:
                      identities:
                        data: []
                    type: member
                links:
                  first: http://localhost:3000/api/v1/jaredlang/activities?activity_tags=&activity_type=spec%3Aactivity&affiliation=&company=&direction=DESC&end_date=&filters=true&identity=&items=10&location=&member_tags=&page=1&sort=occurred_at&start_date=&weight=
                  next: null
                  prev: null
          description: success
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: List activities for a workspace
      tags:
        - Activities
    post:
      operationId: postActivitiesById
      description: Use this method when you know an identity of the member (github, email, twitter, etc.) but not their Orbit ID. Pass fields in the member object to update the member in addition to creating the activity.
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: workspace_id
          description: "Workspace ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Create Activity
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/activity_and_identity"
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  attributes:
                    action: happened
                    created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.705Z
                    custom_description: More info about the thing
                    custom_link: http://link.com/
                    custom_link_text: See the thing
                    custom_title: Did a thing
                    custom_type: custom-type
                    key: thing-123
                    occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.703Z
                    orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/deonroberts/activities/13
                    tags:
                      - product
                      - enterprise
                      - channel:custom
                      - custom_type:custom-type
                      - custom_title:did-a-thing
                    type: CustomActivity
                    updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.705Z
                    weight: "0.2"
                  id: "13"
                  relationships:
                    activity_type:
                      data:
                        id: "8"
                        type: activity_type
                    member:
                      data:
                        id: "9"
                        type: member
                    user:
                      data:
                        id: "42"
                        type: user
                  type: custom_activity
                included:
                  - attributes:
                      category: custom
                      key: custom:happened
                      name: Something happened
                      short_name: Custom
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "8"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      email: josh@orbit.love
                      name: josh
                      source: email
                      source_host: email.host
                      uid: josh@orbit.love
                      username: null
                    id: "7"
                    type: email_identity
                  - attributes:
                      email: null
                      name: Josh Dzielak
                      source: twitter
                      source_host: twitter.com
                      uid: "45297280"
                      username: dzello
                    id: "8"
                    type: twitter_identity
                  - attributes:
                      email: null
                      name: null
                      source: github
                      source_host: github.com
                      uid: null
                      username: dzello
                    id: "9"
                    type: github_identity
                  - attributes:
                      email: null
                      name: null
                      source: linkedin
                      source_host: linkedin.com
                      uid: null
                      username: dzello
                    id: "10"
                    type: linkedin_identity
                  - attributes:
                      activities_count: 0
                      avatar_url: https://d1ts43dypk8bqh.cloudfront.net/v1/avatars/6ea4f872-04b6-4752-8a90-db508525135a
                      bio: "Co-founder & CTO @OrbitModel - we're hiring! · advocate for dev advocates 🥑 · Rails · JAMstack · DevRel · he/him · #BlackLivesMatter"
                      birthday: null
                      company: Orbit
                      created: true
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.659Z
                      deleted_at: null
                      devto: null
                      discord: null
                      discourse: null
                      email: josh@orbit.love
                      first_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.703Z
                      github: dzello
                      github_followers: null
                      id: 9
                      languages: null
                      last_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.703Z
                      linkedin: dzello
                      location: Paris, Île-de-France, FR
                      love: 1
                      merged_at: null
                      name: Josh Dzielak
                      orbit_level: 3
                      orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/deonroberts/members/dzello
                      pronouns: null
                      reach: 8
                      shipping_address: null
                      slug: dzello
                      source: api
                      tag_list:
                        - one
                        - two
                      tags:
                        - one
                        - two
                      teammate: false
                      title: Co-founder & CTO
                      topics: null
                      tshirt: null
                      twitter: dzello
                      twitter_followers: 4598
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.716Z
                      url: https://orbit.love/
                    id: "9"
                    relationships:
                      identities:
                        data:
                          - id: "7"
                            type: email_identity
                          - id: "8"
                            type: twitter_identity
                          - id: "9"
                            type: github_identity
                          - id: "10"
                            type: linkedin_identity
                    type: member
                  - attributes:
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.574Z
                      name: LoriHane
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:22.578Z
                    id: "42"
                    type: user
          description: success
        "422":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                errors:
                  base:
                    - Either identity or member name, email, GitHub, Twitter or Discourse is required
                  email:
                    - is invalid
                  name:
                    - is too long (maximum is 250 characters)
                  workspace:
                    - has blocked this identity
          description: unprocessible
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Create a Custom or a Content activity for a new or existing member
      tags:
        - Activities
  "/{workspace_id}/activities/{id}":
    get:
      operationId: getActivitiesById
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: workspace_id
          description: "Workspace ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: id
          description: "Activity ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  attributes:
                    action: spec_action
                    created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.937Z
                    key: clé
                    occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.931Z
                    orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/bettiebrown/activities/9
                    tags:
                      - spec-tag-1
                      - spec-tag-2
                    type: SpecActivity
                    updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.937Z
                    weight: "1.0"
                  id: "9"
                  relationships:
                    activity_type:
                      data:
                        id: "28"
                        type: activity_type
                    member:
                      data:
                        id: "5"
                        type: member
                    repository:
                      data:
                        id: "6"
                        type: repository
                    user:
                      data:
                        id: "30"
                        type: user
                  type: spec_activity
                included:
                  - attributes:
                      category: spec_category
                      key: spec:happened#4
                      name: Did spec activity
                      short_name: Spec Activity
                      weight: "1.0"
                    id: "28"
                    type: activity_type
                  - attributes:
                      activities_count: 1
                      avatar_url: http://github.com/avatar.png
                      bio: null
                      birthday: null
                      company: null
                      created: false
                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.935Z
                      deleted_at: null
                      devto: null
                      discord: null
                      discourse: null
                      email: null
                      first_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.931Z
                      github: null
                      github_followers: null
                      id: 5
                      languages: null
                      last_activity_occurred_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.931Z
                      linkedin: null
                      location: null
                      love: 1
                      merged_at: null

                      orbit_level: 3
                      orbit_url: http://localhost:3000/bettiebrown/members/parishermiston

                      identities:

                      created_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.915Z

                      name: winfordrogahn
                      owner: angila
                      updated_at: 2021-06-23T11:48:21.915Z

                  - attributes:

                    id: "30"

          description: success
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get an activity in the workspace
      tags:
        - Activities
  "/{workspace_id}/members":
    get:
      operationId: getMembers
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: workspace_id
          description: "Workspace ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: activity_tags
          description: "Activity tags allow to group activities"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: affiliation
          description: "Association with either 'member' or 'teammate'"
          schema:
            enum:
              - member
              - teammate
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: member_tags
          description: "Member tags allow to group members"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: orbit_level
          description: "Orbit level"
          schema:
            enum:
              - "1"
              - "2"
              - "3"
              - "4"
              - n
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: activity_type
          description: "Activity type related to activities"
          schema:
            enum:
              - issues:opened
              - issue_comment:created
              - pull_requests:opened
              - pull_requests:merged
              - star:created
              - discord:message:sent
              - tweet:sent
              - discord:message:replied
              - custom:happened
              - discord:server:joined
              - twitter:followed
              - slack:channel:joined
              - slack:thread:replied
              - discourse:topic:created
              - discourse:post:created
              - slack:message:sent
              - note:created
              - post:created
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: weight
          description: "Weighted score of activity"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: identity
          description: "Activity identity of platforms"
          schema:
            enum:
              - github
              - twitter
              - email
              - discourse
              - linkedin
              - devto
              - slack
              - discord
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: location
          description: "Identifier for the location"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: company
          description: "Identifier for the company"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: start_date
          description: "Activity start date"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: end_date
          description: "Activity end date"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: query
          description: "Activity query"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: page
          description: "Page of the members"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: direction
          description: "Organise activities 'ASC' if Ascending and 'DESC' if Descending"
          schema:
            enum:
              - ASC
              - DESC
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: items
          description: "Number of members"
          schema:
            enum:
              - "10"
              - "50"
              - "100"
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: activities_count_min
          description: "Minumum count of activities"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: activities_count_max
          description: "Maximum count of activities"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: sort
          description: "Sort activities by properties of activity"
          schema:
            enum:
              - activities_count
              - company
              - created_at
              - first_activity
              - github_followers
              - id
              - last_activity
              - location
              - love
              - name
              - orbit
              - reach
              - title
              - twitter_followers
              - updated_at
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: type
          description: "Type related to activities"
          schema:
            type: string

          content: {}
          description: success; no content
        "422":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                errors:
                  identity:
                    - is not attached to this member
          description: identity is invalid or not attached to member
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Remove identity from a member
      tags:
        - Members
    post:
      operationId: postIdentities
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: workspace_id
          description: "Workspace ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: member_id
          description: "Member ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Add member identity
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/identity"
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  attributes:
                    email: josh@orbit.love
                    name: Josh
                    source: twitch
                    source_host: twitch.tv
                    uid: "12345"
                    username: dzello1
                  id: "12"
                  type: other_identity
          description: success
        "422":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                errors:
                  identity_id:
                    - has already been taken
                  source:
                    - can't be blank
                  username_or_email:
                    - must be present
          description: identity is invalid
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Add identity to a member
      tags:
        - Members

  "/{workspace_id}/reports":
    get:
      operationId: getReports
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: workspace_id
          description: "Workspace ID"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: start_date
          description: "Report start date"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: end_date
          description: "Report end date"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: group
          description: "Group in report generation"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: activity_type
          description: "Activity type related to activities"
          schema:
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: type
          description: "Report type to generate"
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                data:
                  attributes:
                    activities:
                      foo:activity:
                        category: spec_category
                        count: 1
                        delta: 1
                        members:
                          active_count: 1
                          active_delta: 1
                          new_count: 1
                          new_delta: 1
                          returning_count: 0
                          returning_delta: 0
                      spec:activity:
                        category: spec_category
                        count: 0
                        delta: 0
                        members:
                          active_count: 0
                          active_delta: 0
                          new_count: 0
                          new_delta: 0
                          returning_count: 0
                          returning_delta: 0
                      total_count: 1
                      total_delta: 1
                    members:
                      active_count: 1
                      active_delta: 1
                      new_count: 1
                      new_delta: 1
                      returning_count: 0
                      returning_delta: 0
                    overview:
                      members_on_orbit_level_1_count: 0
                      members_on_orbit_level_2_count: 1
                      members_on_orbit_level_3_count: 0
                      members_on_orbit_level_4_count: 0
                      members_on_orbit_level_none_count: 0
                      total_members_count: 1
                    timeframe:
                      end_date: 2021-06-23
                      end_date_last: 2021-05-23
                      start_date: 2021-05-23
                      start_date_last: 2021-04-21
                    workspace_id: 97
                  id: "97"
                  type: statistics
          description: success
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get a workspace stats
      tags:
        - Reports
components:
  schemas:
    Activity:
      description: Activities are instances of community participation and contribution.
      properties:
        activity_type:
          description: The type of activity - what action was done by the member
          type: string
        description:
          description: A description of the activity; displayed in the timeline
          type: string
        key:
          description: Supply a key that must be unique or leave blank to have one generated.
          type: string
        link:
          description: A URL for the activity; displayed in the timeline
          type: string
        link_text:
          description: The text for the timeline link
          type: string
        occurred_at:
          description: The date and time the activity occurred; defaults to now
          type: string
        tags:
          description: "[EXPERIMENTAL] Capture facets of the activity to group by later e.g. locations or channels; replaces existing value"
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        title:
          description: A title for the activity; displayed in the timeline
          type: string
        weight:
          description: A custom weight to be used in filters and reports; defaults to 1.
          type: string
      required:
        - title
      title: Custom Activity
      type: object
    activity_and_identity:
      properties:
        activity:
          oneOf:
            - $ref: "#/components/schemas/ActivityWithMember"
            - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PostActivityWithMember"
        identity:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/identity"
      type: object
    ActivityWithMember:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Activity"
        - properties:
            member:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/member"
          type: object
      title: Custom Activity
    custom_or_post_activity:
      oneOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Activity"
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PostActivity"
    identity:
      description: Represents an email address, a profile on networks like github and twitter, or a record in another system.
      properties:
        email:
          description: The email of the person in the source system
          type: string
        name:
          description: The name of the person in the source system
          type: string
        source:
          description: "The type of source: known values include github, twitter, discourse, email, linkedin, devto. Custom values can also be used"
          type: string
        source_host:
          description: Specifies the location of the source, such as the host of a Discourse instance
          type: string
        uid:
          description: The uid of the person in the source system
          type: string
        url:
          description: For custom identities, an optional link to the profile on the source system
          type: string
        username:
          description: The username of the person in the source system
          type: string
      required:
        - source
      type: object
    member:
      description: Members are the people in the community. 
      properties:
        bio:
          description: The member’s bio
          type: string
        birthday:
          description: The member’s birthday, e.g. August 1
          type: string
        company:
          description: The member’s company
          type: string
        devto:
          description: The member's dev.to username
          type: string
        email:
          description: The member's email
          type: string
        github:
          description: The member's GitHub username
          type: string
        linkedin:
          description: The member's LinkedIn username, without the in/ or pub/
          type: string
        location:
          description: The member’s location. That field is not normalized and reflects what can be found in the member’s identities.
          type: string
        name:
          description: The member’s name
          type: string
        pronouns:
          description: The member’s pronouns
          type: string
        shipping_address:
          description: The member’s shipping address
          type: string
        slug:
          description: The member’s slug in the Orbit app
          type: string
        tag_list:
          description: "Deprecated: Please use the tags attribute instead"
          type: string
        tags:
          description: Replaces all tags for the member; comma-separated string or array
          type: string
        tags_to_add:
          description: Adds tags to member; comma-separated string or array
          type: string
        teammate:
          description: Whether the member is a teammate
          type: boolean
        title:
          description: The member’s title
          type: string
        tshirt:
          description: The member’s tshirt size
          type: string
        twitter:
          description: The member’s Twitter username, if available. null otherwise
          type: string
        url:
          description: The URL listed by the member in one of their profiles
          type: string
      type: object
    member_and_identity:
      properties:
        identity:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/identity"
        member:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/member"
      type: object
    note:
      description: A member's notes are free-form areas to attach information to a member's profile.
      properties:
        body:
          description: The body of member's note
          type: string
      required:
        - body
      type: object
    PostActivity:
      properties:
        activity_type:
          enum:
            - content
          type: string
          description: "Activity type related to activities"
        occurred_at:
          description: The date and time at which the content was published; defaults to now
          type: string
        url:
          description: The url representing the post
          type: string
      required:
        - url
        - activity_type
      title: Content Activity
      type: object
    PostActivityWithMember:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/PostActivity"
        - properties:
            member:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/member"
          type: object
      title: Content Activity
  securitySchemes:
    Bearer:
      description: Provide a Authorization header with format 'Bearer <api_key>'. This is the recommended approach. Make sure to include the 'Bearer' part in the text box here.
      scheme: bearer
      type: http

Error: parse: paths: /{workspace_id}/activities: get: operation "getActivitiesInWorkspace": parameters: parse parameter "orbit_level": schema: parse enum values: parse value "false": expected type "string", got "bool"
